schema.description: Schema passed to `react-jsonschema-form` as `schema`. In theory any JSON Schema, in practice, there are [some restrictions](https://react-jsonschema-form.readthedocs.io/en/latest/#json-schema-supporting-status).

uiSchema.description: UI Schema passed to `react-jsonschema-form` as `uiSchema`. See <https://react-jsonschema-form.readthedocs.io/en/latest/form-customization/#the-uischema-object>.
